titles.title: An original resolution to increase the amount allocated to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry by S. Res. 80 relating to committee funding for fiscal year 1988.

calendar.text: Committee on Agriculture ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Agriculture. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Leahy. With written report No. 100-208.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. With written report No. 100-229. Minority views filed.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 451.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 52-35. Record Vote No: 416.

bill.summary: 10/27/1987--Introduced. Increases the proposed FY 1988 allocation to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry in the Omnibus Committee Funding Resolution of 1987 (S. Res. 80, 100th Congress).
